Patrick says he will sign 'three strikes' crime bill

Governor Patrick pledged to sign into law a controversial bill that includes a "three strikes" provision barring parole for repeat violent offenders. (Boston Globe)

Official: Great white shark attacked man

A scientist said he is "more than 90 percent" that a man swimming off Truro was attacked by a great white shark, the first such attack since 1936. (Boston Globe)

News

Electricity grids fail across India

India's energy crisis cascaded over half the country Tuesday when three of its regional grids collapsed, leaving 620 million people without government-supplied electricity for several hours in, by far, the world's biggest blackout.
